content.title: Mission
description: Basaveshwar English Medium School Yaragatti is committed to provide an outstanding educational experience, helping to groom a new generation of students to become the leaders of tomorrow with sound moral and ethical values.

We have been functioning with highly qualified, dedicated and service minded teachers. School has maintained a commitment to providing the highest caliber of artistic and educational experience to exceptionally talented young mind from around the world.

We strongly believe in Nehruâ€™s words, Children are like buds in a garden and should be carefully and lovingly nurtured, as they are future of the Nation and the citizens tomorrow. We indulge ourselves in bringing up the students with good education and with good morals. They believe in ennobling the individual by inculcating the right values, building on spiritual strength and aiding intellectual growth.

We promotes creative thinking and lifelong learning. Our School follows CBSE Curriculum. Our educators are dedicated to inspire children, to achieve the highest standards in all their endeavors as they progress their educational journey with us.
We provide an opportunity to take part in inter school competitions also. School running the classes from Nursery to IV std. From this year we are opened the admissions for the V std.

content.title: Aim
description: We strive to provide world-class education to our students,We always aim at the students development.

All the courses we offer are unique in that they are aligned to the topics and curriculum prescribed by their respective certifying bodies. However, we go the extra mile by providing need-based education to our Students.
All our teachers, without exception, are experienced and certified in their respective fields. They are aware of the trends in the job-market and remain current in their subjects.
It is worth mentioning that we are among a handful of CBSE Schools in Yaragatti, Bailhongal and Savadatti region that employ full-time teaching staff.
